title: 0.5.0还不出，接下来日子怎么熬？？推荐1个类mc游戏，  ios用
txt_content:
0.5.0还不出，接下来日子怎么熬？？推荐几个类mc游戏，  ios用得，
exploration{:10_512:}重大更新！！
内容介绍：Build your own base, mine, castle or whatever you imagine!

Exploration is a game - editor which allows you moving, building and transforming the terrain in the 3D environment.

Inspired by Minecraft game.

What's new in version 1.1.2

- more kinds of blocks - 54 now, 
- simulation of light and water.


版本 1.3.0 中的新功能：- day and night, 
- new terrain generator, 
- various possible terrain sizes, 
- flying mode, 
- more save game slots - 100 now


总算有了时间了，这是pe没有的，

付费版的可以保存并加载游戏
Inspired by Minecraft game.
